import React, { Component } from 'react' const NewsItem =(props) =>{ let {title, description,imageUrl, newsUrl,author,date,source}= this.props; return (
{source.name}
{title}...

{description}.........

By {author===null?"Unknown":author} On {new Date(date).toGMTString()}

Read More
) } export default NewsItem
